The other auxiliary structure 172 measures the deformation of the structure 122 and is necessary since, in the case in question, the movable beam 106 is continuous. This structure 172 comprises a lower arm 180 fixed to the lower arm of the C-shaped structure 122 and an upper arm 182 which carries a transducer 184 for detecting the deformation of the structure 122 so as to identify the zero position, when the punch 108 and the die 104 are in contact with each other, for the servosystem of each of the C-shaped structures 122. In the embodiment of FIGS. 7 to 9, each C-shaped structure 122 is also provided with auxiliary detection structures 170 and 172, both of which are C-shaped.
